title: AR-Based Fuel Cell Education and Renewable Energy Awareness Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic comprehension of scientific terminology and fundamental smartphone operation skills
context.additional_context: Enhancing field practitioners' understanding of renewable energy through smartphone-centered AR learning activities in a limited PC environment

learning_goals: Learners can explain the basic principles of fuel cell systems and their connectivity to renewable energy
Learners can visually analyze fuel cell operation processes using AR technology
Learners can present at least three social and environmental impacts of renewable energy technology advancements

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
